alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 4:19AM MST until November 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches with the heaviest amounts near the mountains. * WHERE...Pueblo, Huerfano, Crowley, Otero, Bent, Prowers and Kiowa Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
